sentence.Network_en: Many hollies have delightful vellow-and-white variegation.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多冬青树长有好看的黄白相间的杂色斑。

sentence.Network_en: Variegation The occurrence of patches of different colors on leaves or flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 色斑:植物叶片或花表面出现的彩色斑块.

sentence.Network_en: CMC can help control colour paste flowing for paper and during paper variegation.
sentence.Network_cn: 在纸张和纸张的上色过程中,CMC有助于控制色浆流动性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... variegate 使…多样化 variegation 杂色，班驳 varnish 清漆；v.涂上清漆.
生物学词汇英语翻译(Q-Z) ... varicella virus 水痘病毒 variegation 彩斑 varietal change 品种变更.
园艺专业英语（a－z） ... valve 阀门 variegation 杂色，斑驳 vase life 插花寿命.
GRE类比反义主考词表 - 小马过河 ... variance 矛盾，不同 variegation 上色,彩色,杂色 veer 转向，改变（话题等）.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of introducing variety (especially in investments or in the variety of goods and services offered);

sentences.sentence: "my broker recommended a greater diversification of my investments"
"he limited his losses by diversification of his product line"

auth_sentence.content: Where variegation makes sense, there are plenty of varieties to choose from, both female and male, and some are not too spiny.
auth_sentence.res_content: Where variegation makes sense, there are plenty of varieties to choose from, both female and male, and some are not too spiny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Where variegation makes sense, there are plenty of varieties to choose from, both female and male, and some are not too spiny.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有多种形态的, 形状不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+form形状→有多种形状,形状不同的
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的
vari变化+ous……的→adj.各种各样的;不同的
variegate弄出杂色+ion表名词→n.彩色斑驳
vari变化+able……的→易变的;可变的;变量的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
stems_affixes.word_buile: vari变化+ety表名词→n.变化, 多样性, 种种, 品种, 种类
vari变化+eg=ag+ate表动词→做出变化→弄出杂色
pre预先+vari变化+cate=ate表动词→预先想好了变化之词→说谎
